Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored 93 not out off just 53 balls
Sikander Raza scored an aggressive 46 off 28 balls, becoming the first Zimbabwean batter to surpass 2000 T20I runs
India won by 10 wickets and sealed the series with a comprehensive victory
Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill won the toss for the fourth consecutive time on this tour and opted to bowl first
Sikandar Raza, the Zimbabwe captain, mentions that their target was around 160, which they considered to be a par score
Shubman Gill, the India captain, expresses his happiness with his first series win as captain but acknowledges that the job is not yet complete with one game left to play
Post-Match Reflections: Yashasvi Jaiswal is the Player of the Match for his outstanding knock of 93 runs off just 53 balls
Shubman Gill praises the team, calling them a great bunch of players, and hopes to lead them forward
Sikandar Raza emphasizes the importance of bouncing back well in all three departments
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch report indicates that it is a fresh pitch today with some moisture that will benefit the pacers early on
Tushar Deshpande made his debut in place of Avesh Khan
Khaleel Ahmed was the pick of the bowlers with figures of 2/32
